chapter.title: Reflection questions
chapter.content:
Now that you have reviewed workforce preparation activities, before moving on please share your thoughts and read other teachers’ responses in the LINCS Career Pathways Group discussion thread.

  • What overlap do you see in lessons you currently teach?
  • Which skills were not explicitly included in the workplace preparation activities discussed so far?

Note that there is no “right” answer here. Be thoughtful about the alignments and intersections between the different skill sets.

After you have shared your thoughts, continue to Session 2 Conclusion.
